amendment.description: An amendment numbered 4 printed in Part C of House Report 116-392 to appropriate an additional $45,000,000 for the implementation of revised duplication of benefits rules for those impacted by Hurricane Harvey.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in Part C of House Report 116-392 to appropriate an additional $45,000,000 for the implementation of revised duplication of benefits rules for those impacted by Hurricane Harvey.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Crenshaw amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A004) offered by Mr. Crenshaw.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Crenshaw amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
